snippet: A panel of Food and Drug Administration advisers has voted to endorse an experimental stool test that uses DNA to detect colon cancer and precancerous growths....

headline.print_headline: FDA Advisers Back Exact Sciences Colon Cancer Test
headline.main: FDA Advisers Back Exact Sciences Colon Cancer Test

lead_paragraph: A panel of Food and Drug Administration advisers has voted to endorse an experimental stool test that uses DNA to detect colon cancer and precancerous growths.
